meanings.definition: Photomicrographies: plural noun, photographs taken through a microscope
meanings.sent1: I looked at the photomicrographies of tiny cells in my science book.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the photomicrographies of bacteria to understand their structure.
meanings.sent3: The photomicrographies of the ants under the microscope made them look like giants!
meanings.sent4: The photomicrographies of the snowflakes revealed intricate patterns like delicate lace.
meanings.sent5: Her collection of photomicrographies captured the beauty of the microscopic world.

meanings.definition: Photomicrographies: verb, the act of taking photographs through a microscope
meanings.sent1: She carefully photomicrographies the cells to document her findings.
meanings.sent2: The students learned how to photomicrographies tiny organisms in biology class.
meanings.sent3: He decided to photomicrographies the dust particles just for fun.
meanings.sent4: The photographer's skillful hands photomicrographies the intricate details of the flower petals.
meanings.sent5: The scientist will photomicrographies the samples to analyze them further.
